on reading compounds: 用【ヨウ】business, task, errand, engagement, use, purpose, for the use of ..., used for ..., made for ..., call of nature, excretion
用意【ヨウイ】preparation, arrangements, provision, getting ready, laying out (e.g. a meal)
登用【トウヨウ】appointment, assignment, promotion
効用【コウヨウ】use, utility, effect, benefit
kun reading compounds: 用いる【もちいる】to use, to make use of, to utilize, to utilise
